title: Crediton Dairy announces £20m investment programme - FoodManufacture.co.uk
summary: Crediton Dairy has announced a £20m project which includes upgrades to processing capabilities, carbon reduction initiatives, and new employee facilities. The company's financial results for 2022 show increased turnover and profits. Crediton Dairy has invested in expanding its product portfolio and growing its pool of local milk suppliers.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 311511 - Fluid Milk Manufacturing, 312120 - Breweries, 312130 - Wineries, 311520 - Ice Cream and Frozen Dessert Manufacturing
